name: Alay
description:
There are rumors of a haven within our land,

a place where one's life need not be damned.

A shelter for those who can provide

for weary men and gods who guide.

Top down roguelike bullet hell set in a post apocalyptic land where the goal is to fulfill your duty as the chosen champion.

Rest stops are given where you have the choice to cook offerings to the Gods to further assist the player in their journey.

---

CONTROLS: 

WASD - move

LEFT CLICK - shoot

SPACE - dash

E - interact

CREDITS:

Art: Mona Liza Dayco, AJ Agregado, Meam Genovaña

Programmer: Weez Conde

Special Thanks: PG-VID Team, Ms Rai Villanueva
